channel.title: Help me with my background!
channel.description:
when i try to change my background on the client this is wat it looks like just previewing it in my folder
[img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk41/h0pe5/backgroundhelp.jpg[/img]
this is wat happens after i compile and run my client
[img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk41/h0pe5/backgroundhelp2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help me with my background!
item.dc:creator: @Cesty Cesty
item.description:
@Cesty wrote:

Easy, you may not changed the name in ur .java files, or you may took the same name as the file was before, but the wrogn extension.
For example :
A client has a picture named Background.png.
You create one at Paint and save it as Background.bmp
You see the difference?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with my background!
item.dc:creator: @yazoomafroo yazoomafroo
item.description:
@yazoomafroo wrote:

that does not mean your picture is not working there is a common error with the client

Read full topic
